title: 955 - Indiana Jones | Tale of the Tape
description:
Join Andyana Jones as her meanders from misremembers and memories of a Saturday he'll never forget.

Sign up for our referral program for a chance for some free Sleepphones! www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/refer

Black Lives Matter. I cannot create a safe place for everyone without stopping to pause and look at what changes I need to make to support that fact. When I say “you deserve a good night’s sleep” it means black lives matter. More resources here- https://linktr.ee/dearestscooter

Here is a list of Anti-racism resources- http://bit.ly/ANTIRACISMRESOURCES

Here is one place you can find support during this or any crisis. If you have more please share them! https://www.crisistextline.org/ There are more global helplines here https://linktr.ee/creatorselfcare

(Become a patron https://www.patreon.com/sleepwithme - the story starts at about 20:00)

Commission a song from the Mystery Bard NOW for a holiday gift over at http://www.jonathanmann.net

Allform - Helix Sleep has LEFT the bedroom and started making sofas, it’s the easiest way you can customize a sofa using premium materials, and at a fraction of the cost of traditional stores. They just launched a new company called Allform and they are already making the best sofas we’ve ever seen. Allform is offering 20% off all orders for our listeners at allform.com/sleep.

Apollo Neuro- is a new wearable that improves your body’s resilience to stress and works by engaging with your sense of touch, helping you feel safe and in control of your stress levels. Try Apollo Neuro today and get 15% off your purchase at apolloneuro.com/sleepwithme.

Headspace - is one of the ONLY meditation apps advancing the field of mindfulness and meditation through clinically-validated research and can reduce stress, improve sleep, boost focus, and increase your overall sense of well-being. Go to https://www.headspace.com/sleepwithme and use sleepwithme for a FREE one month trial!!

Happy Dance - Actress, mom, and do-it-all-er, Kristen Bell co-created Happy Dance to help everyone make the soothing benefits of CBD skin care a part of their daily routine. They’ve got a WHIPPED CBD BODY BUTTER, an ultra-calming CBD BATH BALM, and a multi-purpose CBD COCONUT MELT. Get 15% off at doahappydance.com/sleep

Total Gym Fit - gives me a full-body workout in the comfort of my home for about HALF the price of those expensive fitness bikes. You can do over 85 exercises on one machine! My listeners can get an ADDITIONAL 20% OFF whatever discount they’re currently running. Just head to TotalGymDirect.com/SLEEP to get this special offer.

LinkedIn - When your business is ready to make that next hire, find the right person with LinkedIn Jobs. And now, you can post a job for free. Just visit LinkedIn.com/SLEEP. Terms and conditions apply.

Grove Collaborative- an online marketplace that delivers all-natural home, beauty, and personal care products directly to your door! Go to Grove.co/sleep for FREE gift with your first order of $30 or more.

Celestial Seasonings - believes that everyone deserves a good, restful night’s sleep. Fall in love with Sleepytime from Celestial Seasonings at http://www.celestialseasonings.com/ and use “SLEEP” for free shipping on your first order.
